name: Be Yourself (Ragiri, Maxmagix, Maxime VOLLAT, Kaishi, Hinara)
name_original: Be Yourself (Ragiri, Maxmagix, Maxime VOLLAT, Kaishi, Hinara)
description:
EPITECH Paris

/!\  WARNING: This game may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised.

Change your color to adapt to people you encounter.

you are a slimy blob abducted by scientists, use your color change ability to escape and adapt to the society.
